definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: I still tend to move my fingers, almost subconsciously, when doing arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 当做算术时，几乎是下意识的，我还是会想去掰手指。

sentences.english: He involuntarily raised his hand to scratch his head.
sentences.chinese: 他下意识地举起手来搔他的头顶。

sentences.english: First, I remind myself of the phenomenon of unconscious over-claiming;
sentences.chinese: 第一，我提醒自己当心下意识的要求过高现象。

sentences.english: If you're on the look-out, you automatically start to notice opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 如果你留心，你就会下意识地留意各种机会。

sentences.english: "Where are we ?"The summer spring subconscious asks a course.
sentences.chinese: “我们在哪？”夏泉下意识的问道。

sentences.english: The young rebel against traditions subliminally.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人会下意识的反叛传统。

sentences.english: The Su cripple snow subconscious turns round and runs, but a be sunk to eliminate to drag.
sentences.chinese: 苏残雪下意识转身要逃，却一把被沉消拉住。
它下意识的透露出爱尔兰凯尔特人的气息。

sentences.english: It's perhaps a sub-conscious thing, but it happens.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是下意识的行为，但这种行为确实在发生。

sentences.english: A rupture of bise is thumped, shuddering of his shoulder subconscious trembles.
sentences.chinese: 一阵寒风吹来，他的肩膀下意识的抖了抖。

sentences.english: For me, its more of an automatic response.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，这更多的是一种下意识的反应。

sentences.english: In many European countries handshaking is an automatic gesture.
sentences.chinese: 在许多欧洲国家，握手是一种下意识的行为。

sentences.english: They remember, often subconsciously, how awful they have felt in the past.
sentences.chinese: 他们会经常下意识地记住他们过去时多么的糟糕。

sentences.english: Early experiences can implant fears in the subconscious.
sentences.chinese: 早年的经历会在下意识中埋入恐惧感。

sentences.english: Such "requirements" are just bad knee-jerk design.
sentences.chinese: 这种“需求”只是错误的下意识设计。

sentences.english: He's facing intense, knee-jerk opposition to his efforts to rescue the economy.
sentences.chinese: 他面临对其拯救经济努力的激烈的下意识的反对。

definition: in a great rush/in a flurry
to reach out with one's hand/to hold out a hand/(fig.) to beg/to get involved/to meddle
to turn one's head/to turn around
